description: Setta Studio is a creative studio based in New York City founded by friends Dina Chang and Tim Saccenti. Based on their shared love of art, technology and music, their practice is an immersive and experimental fusion of photography, motion, and digital image making. Recent clients include Iris van Herpen, OnePlus Nord, Warp Records, Nike, Mercedes Benz, King Kong Magazine, 4AD, Gucci, Ghostly Records, Audi, The London Sunday Times, Warner Brothers and Sony Music Entertainment.
name: Setta Studio - Bikkle
